Mapping your domain name to blog

31 Aug 2013 – Mumbai

Setting up a custom domain with Pages

GitHub Pages allows you to direct a domain name of your choice at your Page.

create a file named CNAME in the root of the project directory.

www.example.com

Now Setup the dns. (Instructions on how to change the DNS contact your registrar)

For a domain like example.com, you should use an A record pointing to 204.232.175.78:

For sub domain like hello.example.com, you should use an CNAME record with value of the your user pages subdomain.

Now its done!!

It takes atleast 10 hours for DNS changes to take place.

:)
